channel.title: Jaill command
channel.description: Can somebody give me 1. A working ::jail command that teleports the name given to a proper jail where they have to mine 50+ ore to get out and they cannot tele away even if they log off and 2. Tell me what folder i copy and paste it into, ty

item.title: Jaill command
item.dc:creator: @MoparScapeHelp MoparScapeHelp
item.description:
@MoparScapeHelp wrote:

Lol people would do that… But ALOT of people are dumb enough just to stay in ::jail

Read full topic

item.title: Jaill command
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“MoparScapeHelp, post:5, topic:268780”]Heres ::jail

if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3015; c.teleportToY = 3194; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You Have been thrown in jail!"); c.sendMessage("I would say sorry if I were you"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Heres ::unjail

else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(7); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 2792; c.teleportToY = 4822; c.teleblock = false; c.sendMessage("Hope you have learned the Lesson!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[/quote]
Oh boy, if I got jailed I wonder what I would do?
Maybe log out, log back in and teleport.

Read full topic

item.title: Jaill command

if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3015; c.teleportToY = 3194; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You Have been thrown in jail!"); c.sendMessage("I would say sorry if I were you"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Heres ::unjail

else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(7); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 2792; c.teleportToY = 4822; c.teleblock = false; c.sendMessage("Hope you have learned the Lesson!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

item.title: Jaill command
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

We’re not spoon-feeding you. Learn what methods you need to use to restrict character abilities like that. It would help if you checked out deltascape. What you just said sounds familiar to his jailing system.

Read full topic
